mapper.select: SELECT pi_idx, prd_idx, member_id, pi_contents, pi_write_day, pi_reply, pi_replyer, pi_reply_day, pi_hidden, pi_del FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(review XPKREVIEW) */ rownum rn, pi_idx, prd_idx, member_id, pi_contents, pi_write_day, pi_reply, pi_replyer, pi_reply_day, pi_hidden, pi_del FROM prd_inquiry WHERE prd_idx = #{prd} AND pi_idx > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
